attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am sure that some petitions are being rejected simply because they are not favourable to the government or to the people in the government

e.g. I suggested removasl of honours from discredited MP's (rejected)

Therefore this site is just a political tool for the government to measure the feelings of the people and it will have no influence at all

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
